mapper.select: SELECT m.poster AS posterUrl, m.name AS title, r.reviewContent AS comment, r.mIdx AS mIdx FROM review r JOIN movie m ON r.mIdx = m.mIdx WHERE r.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND r.reviewStatus = 1

SELECT m.mIdx, m.name AS title, m.poster AS posterUrl FROM payment p JOIN reservation res ON p.reservIdx = res.reservIdx JOIN time_table tt ON res.timeTableIdx = tt.timeTableIdx JOIN movie m ON tt.mIdx = m.mIdx WHERE p.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND p.paymentStatus = 0 AND p.paymentType = 0 AND tt.startTime > NOW() GROUP BY m.mIdx, m.name, m.poster ORDER BY MIN(tt.startTime) ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{numPerPage}
